input.sentences: everyone gathered for the tavern 's halloween party .
there was a mountie and a nurse .
there was also a race of pig people .
and last but not least | these two . we do n't know exactly what they were | but they were the life of the party .
output.sentences: Jack was supposed to be in the street handing out literature.
Shortly in to his shift he realized there was a party going on at the local pub.
These folks seems to be letting loose so he decided he could join them.
It wasn't Halloween and yet they were wearing costumes.
Just as he was about to go outside again he realized it was a costume party organized by union supporters.
